005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IDocumentNodeItem;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IModuleNodeItem;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IMetaschemaModule;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema.binding.METASCHEMA;
012
013import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
014
015/**
016 * A Metaschema module represented as binding to Java classes and fields.
017 */
018public interface IBindingMetaschemaModule
019    extends IMetaschemaModule<IBindingMetaschemaModule> {
020
021  /**
022   * Get the underlying module data as a bound object.
023   *
024   * @return the bound class
025   */
026  @NonNull
027  METASCHEMA getBinding();
028
029  /**
030   * Get the underling bound objects as a {@link IDocumentNodeItem}.
031   *
032   * @return the document node item
033   */
034  @NonNull
035  IDocumentNodeItem getSourceNodeItem();
036
037  /**
038   * Get a node item that can be used to query the module's model.
039   *
040   * @return the module node item
041   */
042  @NonNull
043  IModuleNodeItem getModuleNodeItem();
044}
